MAN.TITLE: trans_closure

DESCRIPTION.SP: The transitive closure of a graph is a graph which contains an edge from node u to node v whenever there is a directed path from u to v.
DESCRIPTION.P: trans_closure returns as a new graph g1 the transitive closure of the graph g. This graph must be directed and connected. If <name> if the name of graph g, <name>_trans_closure is the name of the transitive closure.
